theFirst:BasicAttack.NAME: Basic Attack
theFirst:BasicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You are feeling [#666646]groggy...[]

theFirst:BasicDefend.NAME: Basic Defend
theFirst:BasicDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.

theFirst:DrowsyAttack.NAME: Drowsy Attack
theFirst:DrowsyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You are feeling [#666646]groggy...[]

theFirst:DrowsyDefend.NAME: Drowsy Defend
theFirst:DrowsyDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.

theFirst:WokeAttack.NAME: Woke Attack
theFirst:WokeAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You are feeling [#666646]groggy...[]

theFirst:WokeDefend.NAME: Woke Defend
theFirst:WokeDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.

theFirst:WakeUpSlap.NAME: Wake-Up Slap
theFirst:WakeUpSlap.DESCRIPTION: Take !theFirst:Magic! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn.

theFirst:ThornCloak.NAME: Cloak of Thorns
theFirst:ThornCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

theFirst:ExtraArm.NAME: Extra Arm
theFirst:ExtraArm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a bonus attack.

theFirst:Reflect.NAME: Reflect
theFirst:Reflect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, reflect 30% of the damage.

theFirst:TheSeed.NAME: The Seed
theFirst:TheSeed.DESCRIPTION: Add a thefirst:Seed to your deck. NL Removed from your deck after playing.

theFirst:Seed.NAME: Seed
theFirst:Seed.DESCRIPTION: Blossoms after being played 5 times. NL Currently has been played !M! times.

theFirst:Bomb.NAME: Bomb
theFirst:Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take 10 damage. NL Ethereal.

theFirst:Detonator.NAME: Detonator
theFirst:Detonator.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, deal !D! damage to all enemies.

theFirst:BombToss.NAME: Bomb Toss
theFirst:BombToss.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a thefirst:Detonator into your deck X times.

theFirst:Dream.NAME: Dream
theFirst:Dream.DESCRIPTION: Add Yawn and Stretch to your discard pile. Play both to wake up a little.

theFirst:Yawn.NAME: Yawn
theFirst:Yawn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL More powerful if played with Stretch. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:Stretch.NAME: Stretch
theFirst:Stretch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL More powerful if played with Yawn. NL Exhaust.
